data.message:
Gotta please the establishment with a  new record coming out right Eminem? Make sure everyone knows you hate Trump so the establishment has your backing? 
I guess your music is only Torrent worthy now. 
I'll stick behind Trump, and your racism and hatred will be your downfall.
Amazing that Trump was ONLY ever a racist when he decided to run against Democrats. Yet he's been in the public eye for over 30 years, and not once was called a racist until the campaign.
Why is that?...
